## My Hello to You \~\~

Hello there! My name is Marzuki Nooranas or *Marz* for short! I am currently in my final year, majoring in Sociology and Interactive Media Development!

I have always been fascinated by how society functions and its intricate connections, my passion for understanding the world around us, is driven by a desire to foster meaningful connections within all communities!

## My overland journey from Singapore to Vietnam!

To demonstrate this, I embark on frequent backpacking trips across Southeast Asia and actively immerse myself in local cultures to learn about their customs. These experiences provide me with firsthand insights into how different societies interact, not only broadening my horizons but also fostering empathy across diverse communities.
